snippet: President Obama used his spending plan to sketch out an economic future for the United States built on manufacturing, education, alternative energy, infrastructure and science.

byline.original: By ANNIE LOWREY and MOTOKO RICH

lead_paragraph: President Obama used his spending plan to sketch out an economic future for the United States built on manufacturing, education, alternative energy, infrastructure and science.

headline.seo: Obama’s Economy of Tomorrow, Driven by Factories and Schools
headline.main: Budget Embodies Obama’s Vision for Remaking Economy
